SEARCH
Package interfaces

Interface IEnquiryService

public interface IEnquiryService
IEnquiryService interface defines operations for managing enquiries in the BTO system. Provides methods to create, retrieve, update, and delete enquiries.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry)
    Adds an enquiry to the system.
    Enquiry
    createEnquiry(int id, String applicantNRIC, String projectName, String message, String response, EnquiryStatus status)
    Creates a new enquiry and adds it to the system.
    void
    deleteEnquiry(Applicant applicant, Enquiry enquiry)
    Deletes an enquiry from the system and removes it from the applicant's and project's records.
    void
    editEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry, String newMessage)
    Edits the message of an existing enquiry.
    Map<Integer,Enquiry>
    getAllEnquiries()
    Retrieves all enquiries in the system.

    getEnquiriesByNRIC(String nric)
    Retrieves all enquiries submitted by an applicant with the specified NRIC.

    Retrieves an enquiry by its ID.
    void

    Removes an enquiry from the system.
    void
    replyEnquiry(BTOProject project, int enquiryId, String reply)
    Replies to an enquiry for a specific project.
    void
    submitEnquiry(Applicant applicant, BTOProject project, String message)
    Submits a new enquiry on behalf of an applicant for a specific project.

  • Method Details

    • addEnquiry

      void addEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry)
      Adds an enquiry to the system.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - Enquiry to be added.

    • removeEnquiry

      void removeEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry)
      Removes an enquiry from the system.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - Enquiry to be removed.

    • getAllEnquiries

      Map<Integer,Enquiry> getAllEnquiries()
      Retrieves all enquiries in the system.
      Returns:
      Map of all enquiries, keyed by their IDs.

    • getEnquiryByID

      Enquiry getEnquiryByID(int id)
      Retrieves an enquiry by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the enquiry to retrieve.
      Returns:
      Enquiry with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • getEnquiriesByNRIC

      List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByNRIC(String nric)
      Retrieves all enquiries submitted by an applicant with the specified NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - NRIC of the applicant.
      Returns:
      List of enquiries submitted by the applicant.

    • createEnquiry

      Enquiry createEnquiry(int id, String applicantNRIC, String projectName, String message, String response, EnquiryStatus status)
      Creates a new enquiry and adds it to the system.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the enquiry (0 for auto-generated ID).
      applicantNRIC - NRIC of the applicant submitting the enquiry.
      projectName - Name of the project the enquiry is about.
      message - Message of the enquiry.
      response - Response to the enquiry (if any).
      status - Status of the enquiry (OPEN or CLOSED).
      Returns:
      Newly created Enquiry object.

    • submitEnquiry

      void submitEnquiry(Applicant applicant, BTOProject project, String message)
      Submits a new enquiry on behalf of an applicant for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      applicant - Applicant submitting the enquiry.
      project - Project the enquiry is about.
      message - Message of the enquiry.

    • deleteEnquiry

      void deleteEnquiry(Applicant applicant, Enquiry enquiry)
      Deletes an enquiry from the system and removes it from the applicant's and project's records.
      Parameters:
      applicant - Applicant who submitted the enquiry.
      enquiry - Enquiry to be deleted.

    • editEnquiry

      void editEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry, String newMessage)
      Edits the message of an existing enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - Enquiry to be edited.
      newMessage - New message for the enquiry.

    • replyEnquiry

      void replyEnquiry(BTOProject project, int enquiryId, String reply)
      Replies to an enquiry for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      project - Project the enquiry is associated with.
      enquiryId - ID of the enquiry to reply to.
      reply - Reply message for the enquiry.
